Title: Baywatch: Panic at Malibu Pier
Actors: David Hasselhoff, Parker Stevenson, Shawn Weatherly
Plot: Pilot for the cult 90s show 'Baywatch' about a team of L.A. county lifeguards led by heroic Mitch Buchannon. Jill trains rookies. Craig is stalked by a teen girl he saved. Aussie troublemaker joins the team. Mitch's kid needs resc...
